## TrackerCore.addPayloadDict() method

Merges a dictionary into payloadPairs

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dict | Payload | Adds a new payload dictionary to the existing one |
